situation: L had difficulty communicating with peers during a science project, leading to misunderstandings and exclusion.
action: The teacher aide facilitated a small group discussion where each student was given turns to speak. L was provided with key phrases cards to help structure her conversation. The aide also requested students to clarify by repeating back what L was trying to convey.
effect: L felt more included and was able to contribute effectively to the project. Her peers were more understanding and patient, creating a more collaborative atmosphere.
